feedback: Issue is stuck in a loop. Tests timeout after 2700s in iteration 2, same failure as iteration 1 despite attempted CLI binary fix. The test suite is well-written and passes code review, but the underlying CLI binary hangs or deadlocks when invoked. The hanging is a binary execution issue, not a test issue. Further test iterations cannot fix a broken binary. Debugging must focus on the CLI binary's runtime behavior—run commands manually, check for infinite loops/deadlocks/blocking I/O, and verify the binary exits cleanly before running tests again.

iteration_history.summary: Integration tests are structurally sound and approved by code review, with all 12 acceptance criteria covered and 40 comprehensive tests. However, tests cannot execute because the CLI binary hangs indefinitely when invoked. The test suite itself requires no changes—the coder must debug the binary's deadlock/blocking I/O issue and ensure all commands (compile, preview, validate) exit cleanly. After fixing the binary, all tests should pass.
